item.description: In this article, we will learn how to get data from Graph API and display it in SPFx Adaptive Card Extensions(ACEs). if you are new to ACEs then I would recommend going through my previous article where I have covered the concept and basics of ACEs along with step by step tutorial on understanding how the ACEs components work together especially Card View and Quick View.
